DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess impact diagnosis celiac disease general health , healthcare resource utilization , quality life lifestyle . We hypothesize diagnosis subsequent dietary treatment may positive impact variable .
DOC.detailed_description: All new member biopsy-proven celiac disease join Finnish Celiac Society categorize three group accord symptom sign lead diagnosis classical symptom , extraintestinal symptom screen-detected , late divide presenting symptom totally asymptomatic . Several parameter assess general health well-being , quality life healthcare resource utilization evaluate baseline one five year trial . Quality life compare non-celiac control .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis within one year biopsyproven diagnosis Celiac disease diagnosis previously within one year No biopsyproven diagnosis
